What is cPanel hosting?

cPanel hosting refers to web hosting that utilizes cPanel, a popular web-based control panel that simplifies the management of websites and servers. With cPanel, users can easily perform various tasks

Domain Management

Add, manage, and redirect domains and subdomains

File Management

Upload, edit, and manage files and directories

Move to Localhost

Deploy Your OS on cPanel VPS Server
